mapper.select: /*수강중인 교육 조회*/ SELECT EDA.EDCT_APLC_ID AS edctAplcId, -- 교육신청id EDM.EDCT_ID AS edctId, -- 교육id EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID AS edctCntId, -- 차수id EDA.USER_ID AS userId, -- 신청자명 EDM.EDCT_NM AS edctNm, -- 교육명 CLI.EDIN_NM AS edinNm, -- 교육기관명 DATE_FORMAT(EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctSttgYmd, -- 학습시작일 DATE_FORMAT(EDC.EDCT_FNSH_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctFnshYmd -- 학습종료일 FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M EDA, TB_IEP_EDC001M EDC, TB_IEP_EDM001M EDM, TB_IEP_CLI001C CLI WHERE 1=1 AND EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID = EDC.EDCT_CNT_ID AND EDC.EDCT_ID = EDM.EDCT_ID AND EDM.EDIN_CD = CLI.EDIN_CD AND EDA.USER_ID = #{userId} AND EDA.CTCR_YN IS NULL AND EDA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDA.APLC_STG_CD = 'APRFIN' AND EDC.FNSH_YN != 'Y' AND NOW() > EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD ORDER BY EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD

/*과정개설 신청목록 조회*/ SELECT APLC_ID AS aplcId, -- 신청id EDCT_NM AS edctNm, -- 교육명 EDIN_NM AS edinNm, -- 기관명 DATE_FORMAT(EDCT_STTG_YMD, '%Y.%m.%d') AS edctSttgYmd, -- 학습시작일 DATE_FORMAT(EDCT_FNSH_YMD, '%Y.%m.%d') AS edctFnshYmd, -- 학습종료일 DATE_FORMAT(APLC_TS, '%Y.%m.%d') AS aplcTs, -- 신청일자 IF(CNFA_YN = 'Y','확인','미확인') AS cnfaYn -- 확인여부 FROM TB_IEP_EDO001M WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId} ORDER BY CNFA_YN, EDCT_STTG_YMD

/*수강신청 목록 조회*/ SELECT EDA.EDCT_APLC_ID AS edctAplcId, -- 교육신청id EDM.EDCT_ID AS edctId, -- 교육id EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID AS edctCntId, -- 차수id EDA.USER_ID AS userId, -- 신청자명 EDM.EDCT_NM AS edctNm, -- 교육명 CLI.EDIN_NM AS edinNm, -- 교육기관명 DATE_FORMAT(EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctSttgYmd, -- 학습시작일 DATE_FORMAT(EDC.EDCT_FNSH_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctFnshYmd, -- 학습종료일 DATE_FORMAT(EDA.APLC_TS, '%Y.%m.%d') AS aplcTs, -- 신청일시 CLS.APLC_STG_NM AS aplcStgNm -- 신청단계명 FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M EDA, TB_IEP_EDC001M EDC, TB_IEP_EDM001M EDM, TB_IEP_CLI001C CLI, TB_IEP_CLS001C CLS WHERE 1=1 AND EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID = EDC.EDCT_CNT_ID AND EDC.EDCT_ID = EDM.EDCT_ID AND EDM.EDIN_CD = CLI.EDIN_CD AND EDA.APLC_STG_CD = CLS.APLC_STG_CD AND EDA.USER_ID = #{userId} AND EDA.APLC_STG_CD NOT IN ('EDUFIN','CANCEL') AND EDA.CTCR_YN NOT IN ('Y','N') AND EDA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDC.FNSH_YN != 'Y' AND NOW() < EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD ORDER BY EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD

/*교육신청 상세확인 팝업 -- 반려중인 경우만 결재요청버튼 활성화*/ SELECT EDA.EDCT_APLC_ID AS edctAplcId, -- 신청id EDM.EDCT_CLSF_CD AS edctClsfCd, -- 교육분류 CLD.EDCT_CLSF_NM AS edctClsfNm, -- 교육분류명 IF(EDM.SNCT_TGT_YN = "Y", "대상", "대상외" ) AS snctTgtYn, -- 결재대상 EDM.EDCT_NM AS edctNm, -- 과목명 EDM.EDIN_CD AS edinCd, -- 교육기관 CLI.EDIN_Nm AS edinNm, -- 교육기관명 IF(EDM.ONL_EDCT_YN = "N", "오프라인","온라인") AS onlEdctYn, -- 교육방식 DATE_FORMAT(EDC.EDCT_STTG_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctSttgYmd, -- 학습시작일 DATE_FORMAT(EDC.EDCT_FNSH_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctFnshYmd, -- 학습종료일 EDM.EDCT_LEVL AS edctLevl, -- 교육수준 EDA.APND_DAT AS apndDat, -- 첨부파일 EDA.APLC_STG_CD AS aplcStgCd, -- 신청단계코드 EDA.RTRE_CON AS rtreCon -- 반려사유 FROM TB_IEP_EDA001M EDA, TB_IEP_EDC001M EDC, TB_IEP_EDM001M EDM, TB_IEP_CLD001C CLD, TB_IEP_CLI001C CLI WHERE 1=1 AND EDA.EDCT_CNT_ID = EDC.EDCT_CNT_ID AND EDC.EDCT_ID = EDM.EDCT_ID AND EDM.EDCT_CLSF_CD = CLD.EDCT_CLSF_CD AND EDM.EDIN_CD = CLI.EDIN_CD AND EDA.EDCT_APLC_ID = #{edctAplcId};
mapper.update: /*교육신청 상세확인 팝업 > 재결재요청*/ UPDATE TB_IEP_EDA001M SET APLC_STG_CD = "APRDPM", DPM_ATHZ_ID = #{dpmAthzId}, APLC_TS = SYSDATE() WHERE APLC_STG_CD IN ("REJDPM","REJGRM") AND EDCT_APLC_ID = #{edctAplcId};
mapper.select: /*과정개설 신청내역 팝업*/ SELECT EDO.APLC_ID AS aplcId-- 신청ID , CMB.BRNM AS brnm-- 부서명 , CMU.USER_NM AS userNm-- 직원명 , IF(EDO.INBK_EDCT_YN='Y','행내','행외') AS edctYn-- 행내교육 , EDO.EDIN_NM AS edinNm-- 교육기관명 , EDO.EDCT_NM AS edctNm-- 교육명 , EDO.EDCT_CON AS edctCon-- 교육내용 , DATE_FORMAT(EDO.EDCT_STTG_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctSttgYmd-- 교육시작일 , DATE_FORMAT(EDO.EDCT_FNSH_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS edctFnshYmd-- 교육종료일 , DATE_FORMAT(APLC_STTG_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS aplcSttgYmd-- 신청시작일 , DATE_FORMAT(APLC_FNSH_YMD,'%Y.%m.%d') AS aplcFnshYmd-- 신청종료일 , DATE_FORMAT(EDO.EDCT_STTG_TIM, '%H:%i') AS edctSttgTim-- 교육시작시간 , DATE_FORMAT(EDO.EDCT_FNSH_TIM, '%H:%i') AS edctFnshTim-- 교육종료시간 , FORMAT(EDO.EDEX,0) AS edex -- 교육비 , IF(EDO.ONL_EDCT_YN = "N", "오프라인","온라인") AS onlEdctYn -- 온라인교육여부 , EDO.EDCT_LEVL AS edctLevl -- 교육수준 , EDO.APND_DAT AS apndDat -- 첨부파일 FROM TB_IEP_EDO001M EDO, TB_IEP_CMB001M CMB, TB_IEP_CMU001M CMU WHERE EDO.APLC_ID = #{aplcId} AND EDO.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EDO.USER_ID = CMU.USER_ID AND CMU.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CMU.DVCD = CMB.BRCD AND CMB.USE_YN = 'Y';
